summary:
This adds a male Khajiit named Joshur the Ranger to Riverwood Trader...
He\'s marriable, of course! :)
**I\'ll later add screenshots**
descriptionHtml:
This is my first companion mod I ever made.

Info about Joshur:
 	He\'s good at archery as any other ranger
 	He has full Daedric equipment (except the helm): boots, cuirass, gauntlets, arrows (250), and bow
 	He\'s located at the Riverwood Trader on the second floor
 	He\'s marriable (and I\'m happy for my accomplishment)
 	He has blue eyes everyone loves
 	He has the spells: Healing Hands, Fast Healing, Shock Rune, Wall of Storms, etc.
 	Etc., ...

If any bugs – report!
If you like this little mod – endorse! The more endorsements I get, the more stuff I\'ll add to the site and this mod!
If you have any suggestions or request about this mod – tell me!

Credits:
I wanna thank Bethesda for making this awesome game and its Creation Kit, and I thank you for your support!
author: CrazyArgoniaNLover
